commit.message:
jcf-write.c (emit_goto): RESERVE 3 bytes for insn.

2000-01-27  Andrew Haley  <aph@cygnus.com>

        * jcf-write.c (emit_goto): RESERVE 3 bytes for insn.
        (emit_if): Ditto.
        (emit_jsr): Ditto.
